author: Mental Outlaw
description:
In this video I discuss Canonicals decision to replace major components of Ubuntu (Sudo and GNU Core utils) with rust implementations sudo-rs and uutils.

My merch is available at
https://based.win/

Subscribe to me on Odysee.com
